note: Hi everyone, thanks for looking at the about me page, a page that notoriously everyone hates. I started writing blogs back in 1999 when Blogspot was still a thing. Is it still a thing? then I was on Vox for ages and then came to find WordPress. I like just dumping my brain onto the keyboard and find it therapeutic to just have a place where I can store my thoughts and live them there for a while. Typing things out and then reading them back really works for me.

fields.name: Website
fields.value: https://www.frogsareevil.co.uk
